Shivah::

"Well" said shivah "Let's go then"

Shivah transforms to beast mode and took off waitting Ender, to lead 
him to Blackfortress

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>     "I can fly.  I chose a flyer as the specific type of drone for 
my beast 
> mode."  He spreads his insectoid wings.  They glimmer with a 
rainbow effect.  
> The thin membrane appears oily in the sunlight.  "They may look 
flimsy but 
> they aren't."
